name: get_fonts
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool mapilion_vector_and_raster_map_tiles.
Tool description: Mapilion provides you with vector and raster map tiles at scale. Based on OpenStreetMap and OpenMapTiles.
API description: Fetch fonts for vector tiles using a specified range and font stack from the Mapilion API.

range.description: The range of font unicode characters to fetch.

fontstack.description: The font stack to be used for the tiles.
